data_sources.description: Dataset containing information about different cars, including features like Fuel Type, Seller Type, Transmission Type, Car Name, and Selling Price.

data_variables.name: car
data_variables.description: DataFrame containing the car dataset loaded from the CSV file.

data_variables.name: X
data_variables.description: Features used for input in the model, dropping 'Car_Name' and 'Selling_Price' columns.

data_variables.name: Y
data_variables.description: Target variable representing the selling price of the cars.

data_variables.name: X_train
data_variables.description: Training subset of the feature variables.

data_variables.name: X_test
data_variables.description: Testing subset of the feature variables.

data_variables.name: Y_train
data_variables.description: Training subset of the target variable.

data_variables.name: Y_test
data_variables.description: Testing subset of the target variable.

data_variables.name: lrmodel
data_variables.description: Linear Regression model instance used for predictions.

data_variables.name: training_data_prediction
data_variables.description: Predicted values for the training set.

data_variables.name: Y_pred
data_variables.description: Predicted values for the testing set.

data_variables.name: corr
data_variables.description: Correlation matrix of the dataset used for plotting.

flows: Used for EDA, encoding, and splitting into features and target.

data_flow.creation: Created by dropping specific columns from 'car'.
flows: Used for model training and testing.
Used as target variable in model training and testing.
Used for testing the model predictions.
Used for testing the model predictions.
Fitted with X_train and Y_train; used to predict Y_pred.

data_flow.creation: Generated by predicting on X_train using lrmodel.
flows: Internal variable for evaluation (not saved or plotted).

data_flow.creation: Generated by predicting on X_test using lrmodel.
flows: Used for comparison with Y_test in visualizations.
Used to generate a heatmap for EDA.
